x-validator.validator: {{(value, rule)=> {if (!value) return rule.message; const educationObj = JSON.parse(value); if (!educationObj.edu) return rule.message; }}}
{{(value, rule)=> {if (!value) return rule.message; const addressObj = JSON.parse(value); if (!addressObj.workplaceCode && !addressObj.workplaceName) return rule.message; }}}
{{(value, rule)=> {if (!value) return rule.message; const salaryObj = JSON.parse(value); if (!salaryObj.salaryFrom || !salaryObj.salaryTo || !salaryObj.rate) return rule.message; }}}
